meanings.definition: scattered pieces of waste or remains
meanings.sent1: After the storm, the beach was covered in debris from broken shells.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers cleared the debris from the demolished building.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel used debris to build a cozy nest in the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cluttered mess, filled with debris of forgotten memories.
meanings.sent5: The artist created a sculpture using debris found in the junkyard.
